item.title: Let's get started !
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
This blog is for all the tech geeks like me to explore the random thoughts in depth and to get moving with new trends and views on the latest happenings on the horizon

Happy exploring you all !
item.excerpt:encoded: This is the post excerpt.

item.title: Life as it Happens !
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded: Not long ago, I found a certain balance in my life, maybe coincidentally or maybe by hard work. But. There is Life. So you gotta get ready to be rolled over. That's the best and the worst part of life. Just when you think you are flying high, it will bring you down on earth. And sometimes you fall with a thud. Yea, it hurts. But then, there is always that motion in life, if you are quite used to falling, you know what I am saying. If not, well you will get it, with time. So you know, if there is something these experiences teach us, it is that we could be taking life for granted, but life takes real care with us- to not let us fly too high, without wings. We might as well feel sometimes that we are entitled to some kind-of la la land and happiness, that we are born to feel comfortable, and that is when life gives us a wink. there is where comes the ability to manage and control and maybe subdue our own selves or ego, and just observe. 'When it hurts, detach, observe. ' Whenever, wherever the difficult situations arise, those you feel weak against, those you need to collect your courage to fight against, those situations actually test our preparedness, our roots, our center. That how strongly centered we are. How strong is it strength - emotionally, psychologically. So we might as well thank them, for either testing our preparation or reminding us to improve it. So in life, we should really not be concerned about small hiccups along the way. The small tantrums people throw at us. In fact, we should only focus on the things that actually are important. That actually would mean something someday. That's the way it rolls. and that's the way people achieve success. Uber-focus. Focus on the more important goals that your ex-girlfriend's message saying she wants you back. To hell with her man! Grew up, have a goddamn life and a goal to be someone in life,. To actually rise up these fucking teenage dramas and go do something worth fucking remembering. That's the whole point of life, isn't it? To be someone worth remembering, not just by your ex-girlfriend on a lonely night she might be having after a fight with her boyfriend, but, actually by people in general to fucking take inspiration from you and your goals and your commitment towards them , to achieve them, That is the way to show my friend, that you are above life's game, and truly want to live life not as a bed of roses, but as a game that you enjoy to face the bullets, because, in the end, you know that people won't remember you for how many messages or friends or girlfriends or fucks you  had.....but people remember you for how great you were . period. So fuck everything else, and just focus on the things that truly matter. The aims that truly matter. The fucks that truly deserve to be given.

item.title: Let go of Life
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
This is the thing. The main idea behind a successful yet humble life. Maybe a very critical idea behind always learning and ever curious attitude. If you need to survive and enjoy life at the same time, if you are to truly feel happy and satisfied as well as keep doing your work and keep improving your life, then, trust me, this is the idea that will keep you sane. Keep you away from ego and all that bullshit that comes with it. It is a really simple task- just forget or let go of your ego and your whatever the fuck your title, your self-created forts are, just let go of all that stuff. Be present, be in the now and just feel yourself - not your ego, or your title, or your job, or your anything else. Just be You.
Easier said than done. But once you get it, trust me, you will feel all the feelings - emotions- sad and happy but not get very worked up about them. You will be in control. You will be feeling like observing all the activities that mind does over a period of time.
Let's not make a fuss out of the whole meaning of life debate.
it is better to feed a child rather than ignoring him to ponder on the meaning of life. I believe it is our actions which lead us to the meaning of life and not the thoughts which are a mere rendering of our mind- live and die within it. they are supposed to work only when we work. So to get to the ultimate truth, the meaning of life in someone's case, it is better to act. To work. To actually do and then feel the meaning inside you, growing steadily maybe slowly but surely it is there, making everything more satisfying and in another dimension.
When the person truly is in the zone, that is the change in him/her. Then everything else subsides, every emotion, every good or bad feeling, every longing, every craving, everything else subsides, Only that what is true remains inside. Then we can say he/ she is truly energized.

item.title: To learn things and keep moving
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
So a lot is learned in one month, been a great experience and an exponential learning curve. This is what I wanted and hoped for. Not required for an easy life, but a challenging life and a reason to burn, burn and shine. This is what I wanted. And I am getting it. So no complaints on that front at all.
Now left with the practical decisions. Like life, planning, job, etc.
This is again, doable. Only needed things are proper strategy and execution. And proper knowledge up front.
So I would like to input any knowledge any information that is coming towards me and let it all go.
Just do what is required and let go of everything and just be.
Just be what you have to be. Just do. Don't fucking complain, don't make excuses or anything like that. Yea. Only do, just keep doing, keep acquiring the skills required. That's the secret. Hard work and focus. On the strategy planned by knowledge feedback.
That's it. Just be your best and keep going. Focus on good things. Multiply your skills, your strategy should be all guiding you towards the end goal. Let not anything come in between.
Let not anyone come in between
Let not any challenge come in between.
Let not any situation come in between.
You are the force.
You are the challenge.
You are the Storm.

item.title: A Poet's Pathway !
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
To be going into a poet's pathway is in itself a journey, a journey so satisfying that you would need a whole lifetime to actually appreciate the beauty in that moment.
It was indeed so beautiful, so calm, so vivid , a whole new level in itself that I could not believe it would stike me in such an overwhelming way. There was almost nothing I could do, or speak, but only appreciate the beauty, to soak in every detail. The magical place that it was, it could really make anyone into a poet or an artist. So to

item.title: To be Present!
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee

item.title: Deep, Deep Understanding
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded: Have now cultivated a deep, deep-seated humility and empathy for others. Without the judging look for others, without making fun of their problems and their situations and their selves, I have now taken a lesson in appreciating things more, appreciating life more, purely viewing life from that perspective which is unbiased and beyond labels of good or bad or anything else. That is the most important aspect of life that I have cultivated. When you go through this on your own, that is when you realize how important is love. When you go through the ups and downs of life, when you are thrashed around by life like some kind of trash-can in a hurricane, you realize that nobody owes you shit. That you are not entitled to anything by this life, that your effort does not equal to result and that this life is not meant to be fair to you. So fuck this attitude that I am so sweet, why did this happen to me. Life teaches you lessons, when it hurts, observe. That's all. You just need to be true and honest and diligent in your effort, but rest, whatever the result, roll with it. Quit thinking or asking why, accept it first, then man up and do it. See life has taken you this far, it will take you ahead as well. You won't die or anything, just keep accepting the challenge.

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
To imagine is the greatest gift available to us.

-Albert Einstien

So, this is me imagining. [caption id="attachment_155" align="alignnone" width="1880"] Photo by Pixabay on Pexels.com[/caption] Although, half of the times pictures are not what we see, but a mere manifestation of what we imagine to be present, where we see.

Anyways!! IF you are a person who loves to imagine or play with tech tools, conceive new insights, basically anything other than the mundane and monotonous, then  this is the place to BE! 

You can explore more to find out about my projects and I would be lucky if you find them inspiring or take any slice for your imagination. Together, let this world be a better place to collaborate and explore forward. Happy surfing!!
Maybe click on My Code Base to explore more about my cool new projects and code jams or catch all the latest buzz around tech favorite topics like autonomous driving, deep learning, artificial intelligence, data science, cryptography, etc.
Or
Read random meanderings about life, inspiration, love and loss while sipping a coffee, check out my visual blog posts in Random segment.

And, this is your blogger, imagining away.

item.title: My Code Base
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
The coolest projects around ...

 

Check out the fun, interesting projects that you would find relevant to the most hottest relevant and challenging problems we are facing such as autonomous driving, cryptography, cloud computing and much more..

If you are a reader and not that tech-savvy, hold on we have something for you in the Random page.. Feel free to check it out. So you are interested in checking out some of the projects related to autonomous driving, data mining, image processing, deep learning? Or maybe you would like other cool stuff like Object recognition talking with Arduino hardware ? Feel free to check out all the links for some easter eggs and interesting stuff.
If you want all the hottest new updates, happenings and craziness in the field of AI, Deep Learning and Data Science, keep in touch, follow me here and on facebook. We will keep on putting the best content out here.
You can also surf this place for some cool links about where to start with the basics of deep learning and AI, away from all the hype. Or maybe you would like to read about some cool new events on the horizon in this field !! Or, maybe you are one of the budding data science enthusiasts ;) You would find these and much more stuff , so happy exploring !!

Links for various Projects done :

  • Autonomous vehicles: Object detection and recognition

    Get started here!
[caption id="attachment_179" align="aligncenter" width="582"] Photo by Mikes Photos on Pexels.com[/caption] Kidding! The below one is the real peek into my project work : [caption id="attachment_214" align="aligncenter" width="641"] Photo by Rajshekhar, et al : Object identification by YOLO[/caption]

  • Advanced Driver Assist Systems using Multi-modal feedback with haptics ( paper communicated for publishing ) (Get started here!)

And here is a little peek into my project work assembly. [caption id="attachment_213" align="alignnone" width="1427"] Photo by Rajshekhar : Haptic+Visual feedback interface with Lane Departure Warning System (LDWS)[/caption]

  • Application for Extracting, plotting and filtering human heartbeat from videos

    Get started here!
[caption id="attachment_media-34" align="aligncenter" width="530"] Photo by Pixabay on Pexels.com[/caption]

  • Attendance recording and monitoring using social media platform, image processing and cloud computing

    Here is another peak into the project done with collaboration with so many beautiful people :)

  • Link to my published IEEE paper : Cloud attendance monitoring

 

  • Data Scientists Alert! Classification and analysis of time series data classifiers based on deep neural network models : data mining, data cleaning

    Link to my project presentation: DataScience Project _ 5 minute pitch.pptx
  •  Get started here!
 

  • Digital Image pre-processing and encryption using invisible Watermarking using Fuzzy logic

  • Get started here!
 

  • Input any video and adding imperceptible Watermark on it as well as compressing it using Motion JPEG

     
  • Get started here!

And here is something special for you, or the ever-enthusiastic reader :

To know about the BEST Artificial Intelligence or Deep Learning or Data Science links and resources :

Hottest Resources on AI, Deep Learning and Data Science

    `Stay hungry, Stay foolish` Visit me on facebook for an interesting resource Page for more recent news and articles on Data Science : [facebook.com/datascienceisfun]   My another home

item.title: Hottest Resources
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
Here are some of the BEST Artificial Intelligence or Deep Learning or Data Science links and resources available free of cost on the internet. Make sure you use them to your best advantage !!

Links for learning resources for :

  • Deep Learning - where to start from ?

    • Neural Network and Deep Learning : Basic concepts
    • Karpathy Github blog on neural networks
    • Basic Concepts on deep learning : KDnuggets
    • Intro to deep learning : Hyperverge
 

  • Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning - What is all this fuss about ?

    • Dense read from one of the pioneers in deep learning
    • NVidia Blogs on AI, Parallel computing and Deep learning
 

  • Data Science - Why should I even be concerned ?

    • Python for Data Science: Mathematical approach
    • Data Science from scratch white paper pdf
    • Kaggle data science pdf
 

  • Autonomous driving - it's coming !

    • Google Waymo : A closer look
    • [facebook.com/datascienceisfun]
 
`Stay hungry, Stay foolish`
Visit us on facebook for an interesting resource Page for more recent news and articles on Data Science : [facebook.com/datascienceisfun]

item.title: India to Canada
item.dc:creator: rajshekharmukherjee
item.content:encoded:
I would update with many upcoming blogs about my journey from India to Canada and how difficult or easy it was and how different it was.
The whole concept of having a good
